mean: Mean: The average value of the data.
std: Standard Deviation: A measure of the amount of variation or dispersion of a set of values.
min: Minimum: The smallest value in the data.
max: Maximum: The largest value in the data.
sum: Sum: The total sum of all values in the data.
count: Count: The total number of values in the data.
median: Median: The middle value of the data when it is sorted.
25th_percentile: 25th Percentile: The value below which 25% of the data falls.
75th_percentile: 75th Percentile: The value below which 75% of the data falls.
PCC: Pearson Correlation Coefficient (PCC): A measure of the linear relationship between two variables. It ranges from -1 to 1, where 1 indicates a perfect positive correlation, -1 indicates a perfect negative correlation, and 0 indicates no correlation.
tweet_likes: Number of likes the tweet has received.
tweet_retweets: Number of retweets the tweet has received.
tweet_replies: Number of replies the tweet has received.
tweet_quotes: Number of quotes the tweet has received.
tweet_chars: Number of characters in the tweet's text.
tweet_words: Number of words in the tweet's text.
tweet_annotations: Number of annotations in the tweet.
tweet_cashtags: Number of cashtags (stock tickers) mentioned in the tweet.
tweet_hashtags: Number of hashtags mentioned in the tweet.
tweet_mentions: Number of user mentions in the tweet.
tweet_urls: Number of URLs included in the tweet.
tweet_photos: Number of photos attached to the tweet.
tweet_videos: Number of videos attached to the tweet.
tweet_cards: Number of Twitter cards attached to the tweet.
tweet_referenced_tweets: Number of tweets referenced in the tweet.
